Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the class IIb bacteriocin
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Comments: Although beta alone appeared to retain a trace of inhibitory activity, the complementary action of both the alpha and beta peptides was required for full bacteriocin activity.

Literature.Title: Purification and partial amino acid sequence of plantaricin S, a bacteriocin produced by Lactobacillus plantarum LPCO10, the activity of which depends on the complementary action of two peptides.
Literature.Author: Jim©nez-D­az R, Ruiz-Barba JL, Cathcart DP, Holo H, Nes IF, Sletten KH, Warner PJ.

Literature.Title: Molecular analysis of the locus responsible for production of plantaricin S, a two-peptide bacteriocin produced by Lactobacillus plantarum LPCO10.
Literature.Author: Stephens SK, Floriano B, Cathcart DP, Bayley SA, Witt VF, Jim©nez-D­az R, Warner PJ, Ruiz-Barba JL.

Literature.Title: Molecular analysis of the genes encoding Plantaricin S, a two-peptide bacteriocin produced by Lactobacillus plantarum LPCO10.
Literature.Author: Witt V.F.,Bayley S.A.,Cathcart D.P.,Floriano B.,Stephens S.K.
